Html:
First of all, I've loved Irony since I learned about the library two years ago. It has amazing potentials. 
But I couldn't find any documentation on the library at the time and currently either.

Is there any way to learn more about Irony?

sorry, same situation
many folks came forward suggesting help with docs, but then disappeared 
wiki book seems abandoned.
I barely have time to fix urgent problems
Almost two years have gone. So please let me ask again do you have any progress/plans for the documentation creation?
i don' know. did you write any? - me neither. sorry
